#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
ll n;
using namespace std;

ll fib(ll x,ll y)
{
  ll z=0,i=0;
  while(z<=n)
  {
   z=x+y;
   i++;
   x=y;
   y=z; 
  }
  //cout<<i<<endl;
 return i;
} 

int main()
{
  ll m,a,b,c;
  cin>>m>>n;
  while(m!=0 && n!=0)
  {
    a=1;
    b=1;
    c=0;
    while(a<=n)
    {
     c=a+b;
    //cout<<a<<" "<<b<<endl;
     if(a>=m)
     {
       cout<<fib(a,b)+1<<endl;
       break;             
     }
   a=b;
   b=c;
    }
    cin>>m>>n;
  }
return 0;
}
